Class Volo

java.lang.Object
aeroporto.aeroportopackage.model.Volo
Direct Known Subclasses:
VoloArrivo, VoloPartenza
public abstract class Volo extends Object
The abstract class that represents a flight. Contains every common data between arriving and departing flights.

  • Constructor Details

    • Volo

      protected Volo(String codiceUnivoco, String compagniaAerea, String aeroportoPartenza, String aeroportoArrivo, int giornoPartenza, int mesePartenza, int annoPartenza, String orarioPrevisto, int minutiRitardo)
      Instantiates a new Volo.
      Parameters:
      codiceUnivoco - the univocal id of the flight.
      compagniaAerea - the flight company.
      aeroportoPartenza - the departure airport.
      aeroportoArrivo - the destination airport.
      giornoPartenza - the arrival/departure day.
      mesePartenza - the arrival/departure month.
      annoPartenza - the arrival/departure year.
      orarioPrevisto - the expected time of arrival/departure.
      minutiRitardo - the delay minutes.
